ygData.messageBody:
Answers as per normal system....
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
- What's the sucessful rate when you start to train in this skill?
>>Berry low. Mines only 4 but raises "quite" fast.

- At the begining stage, I believe I will fail many times. May I know if I
fail, what's the implication?
>>You can't tell from the screen if you fail or succeed.

- Does failure means heal less or the bandage is totally wasted and heal
nothing at all?
>>I believe less but if below skill pt of 20. I think its practically waste
of bandages.

- So far I didnt anyhow use my practice point. I think I have around
35points balance at lvl 8. To minimise the cost of bandage, is it advisable
to throw them all into bind wound skill?
>>Nah but then you might, IF you have no other trade skills or hard to train
magic spells.

- Can this bind wound skill heal other than self?
>>Yes! Good for saving lives! I saved mine and others saved mine.

- What is the healing effect of this skill, does it have a delay time?
>>It heals up to 20hps. Delay time is quite short so you don't have to
worry. When you heal, it does the "looting" action.

- How can one rise the skill fast?
>>Get a magician or some kind of mage class to conjure them for you. Do play
them though <grins> About the market price, I've no idea cos I got mine
free.

- Can wiz use this skill while fighting?
>>Once the healing target moves, you are interrupted so the answer is no.

- What is the lvl ceiling of this skill for wiz? 3+3/lvl (like our melee
skill) or 5+5/lvl (like our magery skill)?
>>Pardon me but for this, I've no idea.

Wilson aka Yutaka
